reviewText: A NICE KOREAN DRAMA THE STORY IS WELL WRITTEN I GOT THE ORIGINAL VERSION FROM MBC SO THERE IS NO PROBLEM IN THE SUBTITLES A VERY GOOD DRAMA

I started watching this soap in the internet and i liked it. I bought a copy but UNFORTUNATELY, I bought one with POOR ENGLISH SUB. Besides that the video does not look original at all. The MBC emblem on top is cut-off showing only the MB no matter how I adjust the picture width from normal to zoom. Don't buy the one with the navy blue box with the picture of the characters zoomed in AND with added chinese sub. It is NOT THE ORIGINAL!
although  it might  not  be  a  good  idea  to  watch while  eating. This  is  a  very  good  drama  with  a  good  story  line.
